results.summary: On Thursday, the defense wrapped up its cross-examination of a teenage girl who says she was sexually assaulted by an older classmate at the elite St. Paul's prep school in New Hampshire. The girl was deeply emotional under questioning. NBC's Gabe Gutierrez reports for TODAY.
